long_description: Compatible with the Burley D'Lite, Solo, Encore or Cub Bike Trailers (sold separately), this Burley Double Jogger Kit converts your Burley carrier from a bike trailer to a jogger. Hub engaged parking brake on Burley trailers means no more need for a hand brake, making installation a snap. 16 in. alloy wheel with wrist tether. Burley Double Jogger Kit is not compatible with models made before 2007.
short_description: Compatible with the Burley D'Lite, Solo, Encore or Cub Bike Trailers (sold separately), this Burley Double Jogger Kit converts your Burley carrier from a bike trailer to a jogger.
